g.text: No ML ‚Ä¢ No Neural Networks ‚Ä¢ No Embeddings ‚Ä¢ 100% Boolean Logic ‚Ä¢ Sub-millisecond Performance
‚Ä¢ Labeled Data ‚Üí Feature Extraction ‚Üí Pattern Mining ‚Üí Rule Generation
title patterns, word frequencies, phrase patterns
DOM patterns, element counts, nesting depth
tag patterns, schema presence, social tags
‚Ä¢ Monitor Performance ‚Üí Analyze Errors ‚Üí Propose Fixes ‚Üí Deploy
‚Ä¢ Tree Inheritance ‚Äî extend base with overrides
1. Boolean Purity ‚Äî Every decision is true/false
The Advanced Boolean Classifier (ABC) is a pure decision tree
system for page classification. No ML, no neural networks,
no embeddings ‚Äî just boolean logic and deterministic rules.
